alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hyde and central Beaufort Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pinetown, or 8 miles northeast of River Road, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belhaven, Sladesville, Pinetown, Ransomville, Ponzer, Scranton, Pungo, Pamlico Beach, Leechville, Winsteadville, Sidney Crossroads, Terra Ceia, Yeatesville, Alligator Lake, Bayview Ferry Terminal, Sydney Crossroads and Pantego. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
